trans-unit.source: Contains filter criteria for data extracted from a workflow instance in a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions" />.
trans-unit.target: 包括從 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions" /> 中的工作流程執行個體上擷取的資料之篩選條件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> specifies the value of a piece of data extracted from a workflow.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> 指定從工作流程擷取之資料片段的值。

trans-unit.source: It is used to constrain the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> in a query of the tracking data base used by a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>.
trans-unit.target: 它可用來限制 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> 在查詢 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 使用的追蹤資料庫時傳回的 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService> 物件集合。

trans-unit.source: You can add <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> objects to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to specify that the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> be constrained to those possessing the specified set of extracted data.
trans-unit.target: 您可以將 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> 物件加入至 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，以指定 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> 傳回的 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 物件集合必須符合具有指定之擷取資料的集合。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The default constructor initializes <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue.DataValue%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue.FieldName%2A>, and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue.QualifiedName%2A> to a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 預設建構函式將 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue.DataValue%2A>、<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue.FieldName%2A> 和 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue.QualifiedName%2A> 初始化為 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `Nothing`)。

trans-unit.source: You must set all of these properties in order to configure the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue>.
trans-unit.target: 您必須設定這些屬性以設定 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue>。

trans-unit.source: The qualified name of the activity from which the data was extracted.
trans-unit.target: 從中擷取資料之活動的限定名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the member from which the data was extracted.
trans-unit.target: 從中擷取資料之成員的名稱。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="string" /> representation of the value of the data.
trans-unit.target: 資料值的 <see langword="string" /> 表示。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue" /> class by using the specified qualified name of an activity, data field name, and <see langword="string" /> representation of a data value.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的活動限定名稱、資料欄位名稱和資料值的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue" /> 表示，初始化 <see langword="string" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue.QualifiedName%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue.FieldName%2A>, and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue.DataValue%2A> properties are set according to the values specified by the equivalent parameters to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue.QualifiedName%2A>、<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue.FieldName%2A> 和 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue.DataValue%2A> 屬性會根據建構函式之對等參數指定的值加以設定。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates creating a new instance of a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> object.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例將示範如何建立 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> 物件的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This example is from the Workflow Monitor SDK sample.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例來自＜工作流程監視器 SDK＞範例。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Workflow Monitor Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[工作流程監視器範例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see langword="string" /> representation of the value of the extracted data.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定所擷取資料之值的 <see langword="string" /> 表示。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="string" /> representation of the value of the extracted data.
trans-unit.target: 所擷取資料之值的 <see langword="string" /> 表示。

trans-unit.source: The default is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 預設為 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 <see langword="Nothing" />)。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue.DataValue%2A> can be a null reference (`Nothing`).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue.DataValue%2A> 可以是 null 參考 (`Nothing`)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates setting the DataValue property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範設定 DataValue 屬性。

trans-unit.source: This example is from the Workflow Monitor SDK sample.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例來自＜工作流程監視器 SDK＞範例。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Workflow Monitor Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[工作流程監視器範例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the activity member from which the data was extracted.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定從中擷取資料的活動成員名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the activity member from which the data was extracted.
trans-unit.target: 從中擷取資料之活動成員的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The default is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 預設為 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 <see langword="Nothing" />)。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue.FieldName%2A> corresponds to the name specified in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem.FieldName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue.FieldName%2A> 對應於 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem.FieldName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 中指定的名稱。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue.FieldName%2A> can, therefore, be set to specify an activity field or property; a member of an activity field or property; or a single element of an activity field or property (or a member of either) that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 因此，<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue.FieldName%2A> 可以設定成指定活動欄位或屬性、活動欄位或屬性的成員、實作 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> 介面的活動欄位或屬性 (或其成員) 的單一項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information see <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem.FieldName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingExtract.Member%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract.Member%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract.Member%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem.FieldName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>、<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingExtract.Member%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>、<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract.Member%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 或 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract.Member%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates setting the FieldName property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範設定 FieldName 屬性。

trans-unit.source: This example is from the Workflow Monitor SDK sample.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例來自＜工作流程監視器 SDK＞範例。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Workflow Monitor Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[工作流程監視器範例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the qualified name of the activity from which the data was extracted.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定從中擷取資料的活動限定名稱。

trans-unit.source: The qualified name of the activity from which the data was extracted.
trans-unit.target: 從中擷取資料之活動的限定名稱。

trans-unit.source: The default is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 預設為 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 <see langword="Nothing" />)。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue.QualifiedName%2A> is equivalent to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.QualifiedName%2A> property of the activity from which the data was extracted.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue.QualifiedName%2A> 相當於擷取資料所在之活動的 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.QualifiedName%2A> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates setting the QualifiedName property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範設定 QualifiedName 屬性。

trans-unit.source: This example is from the Workflow Monitor SDK sample.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例來自＜工作流程監視器 SDK＞範例。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Workflow Monitor Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[工作流程監視器範例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2)。
